Sentencas: Solid oxide cells (SOCs) are especially important in the context of a boom in the intermittent renewable energy.
Titulo: Performance evolution analysis of a solid oxide cell operated in fuel-cell, electrolysis and cycle modes

Sentencas: However, the widespread commercialization of SOCs is still constrained by stability.
Titulo: Performance evolution analysis of a solid oxide cell operated in fuel-cell, electrolysis and cycle modes

Sentencas: To investigate the performance evolution mechanisms, fuel-cell, electrolysis, and reversible operations of an industrial-size (10 cm x 10 cm) SOC were conducted.
Titulo: Performance evolution analysis of a solid oxide cell operated in fuel-cell, electrolysis and cycle modes

Sentencas: The electrochemical impedance spectroscopy (EIS) measured under open-circuit/a small DC bias and operating current was analyzed employing the distribution of relaxation times (DRT) method and equivalent circuit model (ECM) fitting.
Titulo: Performance evolution analysis of a solid oxide cell operated in fuel-cell, electrolysis and cycle modes

Sentencas: Under the fuel-cell and electrolysis modes, the resistances corresponding to the electrode processes held different change trends with increasing DC biases.
Titulo: Performance evolution analysis of a solid oxide cell operated in fuel-cell, electrolysis and cycle modes

Sentencas: Compared with the fuel-cell mode, the proportion of the resistance related to the gas diffusion and conversion processes of the fuel electrode was higher in the electrolysis mode.
Titulo: Performance evolution analysis of a solid oxide cell operated in fuel-cell, electrolysis and cycle modes

Sentencas: Meanwhile, the resistances associated with the charge transfer reaction, gas diffusion and conversion processes of fuel electrode increased faster in the electrolysis mode.
Titulo: Performance evolution analysis of a solid oxide cell operated in fuel-cell, electrolysis and cycle modes

Sentencas: Besides, through the evolution of j-V curves and resistances of electrode processes, the whole operation process was divided into the initial stage (first activation and then rapid-degradation) and the stable stage.
Titulo: Performance evolution analysis of a solid oxide cell operated in fuel-cell, electrolysis and cycle modes

Sentencas: In the postmortem analysis, Ni non-percolating, Ni coarsening and change of pore morphology in the fuel electrode were mainly observed.
Titulo: Performance evolution analysis of a solid oxide cell operated in fuel-cell, electrolysis and cycle modes

Sentencas: Combined with the detailed EIS analysis and microstructure changes, the dominant performance evolution mechanism in different stages of the overall operation process was proposed.
Titulo: Performance evolution analysis of a solid oxide cell operated in fuel-cell, electrolysis and cycle modes
Performance evolution analysis of a solid oxide cell operated in fuel-cell, electrolysis and cycle modes
